section.name: Joda Convert
section.p: Joda-Convert provides a small set of classes to aid conversion between Objects and Strings. It is not intended to tackle the wider problem of Object to Object transformation.
Joda-Convert is licensed under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 licence.

section.name: Documentation
section.p:
Various documentation is available:
The javadoc for the latest SVN
The SVN repository

section.name: Contact
section.p: If you have any questions, or want to volunteer to help, just email Stephen Colebourne via scolebourne.at.users.sourceforge.net.
